name: Teuthida (Project Boost)
description:
An early version of a game I created through the Complete Unity Developer 2.0 course on Udemy.com.  I intend to improve on this game as I go on, so I guess you could say this is in "early access".. ;-)

Controls:-

Space = Thrust

A = Rotate right

D = Rotate left

Land your rocket on the green pad, don't hit anything.
